qas.question: What is the highest bit rate the LAME encoder allows?
The LAME encoder allows bit rates that are what?
Even though few MP3 players can play it, LAME also offers which option?
The ISO standard dictates that decoders only need to be able to decode streams that have how high of a bit rate?

context: <a1_0>Non-standard<a1_0/> bit rates up to <a0_0>640 kbit/s<a0_0/> can be achieved with the LAME encoder and the <a2_0>freeformat<a2_0/> option, although few MP3 players can play those files. According to the ISO standard, decoders are only required to be able to decode streams up to <a3_0>320<a3_0/> kbit/s.
